Rule.Name: Supplier Alert
Rule.Contents: <rule> <event-clause> <function> <system>viewset</system> <name>insertupdatevs</name> <param name="reportid" order="0">-1</param> <param name="modifier" order="1"><Modifier dataset="_SupplierInfo"><FieldRefs><DatasetField datasetField="_SupplierName" datasetFieldName="SupplierName" fieldRefID="0" hidden="0" order="0" shortDescription=""></DatasetField><DatasetField datasetField="_OrderID" datasetFieldName="CustID" fieldRefID="1" hidden="0" order="1" shortDescription=""></DatasetField><DatasetField datasetField="_PurchaseOrderID" datasetFieldName="PurchaseOrderID" fieldRefID="2" hidden="0" order="2" shortDescription=""></DatasetField><DatasetField datasetField="_SupplierPrice" datasetFieldName="SupplierPrice" fieldRefID="3" hidden="0" order="3" shortDescription=""></DatasetField></FieldRefs><RecordFields><RecordField dataType="STRING" datasetField="_SupplierName" fieldID="0" fieldRefID="0" order="0"></RecordField><RecordField dataType="STRING" datasetField="_OrderID" fieldID="1" fieldRefID="1" order="1"></RecordField><RecordField dataType="STRING" datasetField="_PurchaseOrderID" fieldID="2" fieldRefID="2" order="2"></RecordField><RecordField dataType="FLOAT" datasetField="_SupplierPrice" fieldID="3" fieldRefID="3" order="3"></RecordField></RecordFields><GroupFilter><Branch type="ALL"><Entry type="GT"><Node ID="COUNT(_OrderID)_1" operation="COUNT" type="AGGREGATE">_OrderID</Node><Node type="INTEGER">3</Node></Entry></Branch></GroupFilter></Modifier></param> <param name="type" order="2">UserModifier</param> <param name="runasuser" order="3">user.1</param> </function> </event-clause> <constraint-clause></constraint-clause> <rule-clause> <action> <condition></condition> <function> <system>notify</system> <name>Send</name> <param name="userid" order="0">user.OracleSystemUser</param> <param name="method" order="1">SMTP</param> <using-clause><SubjectText><text><![CDATA[Customer Exception]]></text></SubjectText><AlertOwner><![CDATA[-1]]></AlertOwner><Type><![CDATA[Message]]></Type><MessageText><DatasetSystemField><![CDATA[_SupplierName]]></DatasetSystemField><text><![CDATA[ has exceeded 3 customers]]></text></MessageText> </using-clause> <failover-clause></failover-clause> </function> </action> </rule-clause></rule>
